<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4974</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Correcting Comprehensions</string>
            <string language="es">Corrección de comprensión</string>
            <string language="ga">Léamhthuiscintí a Cheartú</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beheben Des Erfassens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corriger des Compréhensions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrigindo Compreensões</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Correggere Le Comprensioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανοήσεις διόρθωσης</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A suggested method of correcting Leaving Cert. higher or ordinary level comprehensions in a quick and efficient way.</string>
            <string language="es">Un método sugerido para corregir las comprensiones del nivel superior u ordinario del certificado Leaving de forma rápida y eficiente</string>
            <string language="ga">Modh molta le léamhthuiscintí ardleibhéil nó bunleibhéil don Ardteist a cheartú ar bhealach sciobtha agus éifeachtach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Spanish</string>
            <string language="es">Español</string>
            <string language="ga">Spáinnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine vorgeschlagene Methode des Behebens des 
verlassenden CERT höheren oder gewöhnlichen waagerecht 
ausgerichteten Erfassens in einer schnellen und leistungsfähigen 
Methode.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une méthode suggérée de corriger des 
compréhensions de niveau plus élevées ou ordinaires partantes de 
CERT d'une voie rapide et efficace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um método sugerido de corrigir compreensões 
niveladas mais elevadas ou ordinárias saindo do CERT em uma maneira 
rápida e eficiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un metodo suggerito di correggere le più alte o 
comprensioni livellate ordinarie andanti del CERT in un modo rapido ed
efficiente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προτεινόμενη μέθοδος την αναχώρηση Cert. 
υψηλότερες ή συνηθισμένες κατανοήσεις επιπέδων με έναν γρήγορο 
και αποδοτικό τρόπο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spanisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Espagnol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Espanhol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spagnolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισπανικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
